text: TERC may refer to: *Telomerase RNA component, a human gene. *TERC (Cambridge, Massachusetts), a nonprofit research and development organization in Cambridge, Massachusetts, the developers of the Investigations in Numbers, Data, and Space mathematics curriculum **"Investigations" or TERC, a K–5 mathematics curriculum, developed at TERC (Cambridge, Massachusetts) *Technical Education Research Centers (TERC) *CSIRO Tropical Ecosystems Research Centre *Terrestrial Environment Research Center. A research center at University of Tsukuba. *Thermal Enclosure Rater Checklist A standard for achieving green building certification in the Energy Star home rating program.
title: TERC
